english.segment1: My peace I leave with you. Not as the world giveth - Give I to you. Now I must go. But truly I will send my Spirit to guide you. Whenever you need Me - If you ever doubt
english.segment2: Look East! - Look East!. Surely as the sun is rising. So I am coming
english.segment3: Heaven and earth must pass away. But My word remains - I cannot lie. Look to the sky and know that I am very alive. Soon you'll see. Whenever you need Me - If you ever doubt
english.segment4: Look East! - Look East!. Surely as the sun is rising. So I am coming
english.segment5: Open up ye gates let the King come in. Look to the east of Jerusalem
english.segment6: Look East! - Look East!. Surely as the sun is rising. So I am coming
